page.title: 12Education
page.content: playground. There is no water or no toilet facilities.The toilets are out doors at the end of the playground. Visits were made to Devon County Show at Exeter.Several other educational visits were made to the Paignton zoo and Powderham Castle and many others. {1985 Today there are 67 children and 3 teachers. This winter is very cold and the toilets are frozen.There are lots of snow.We had a snowman competition.The school closed early because of snow.Money was raised for charities.We collected for Help the Aged and we raised Â£260 for Save the Children fund in Africa.On Shrove Tuesday we took part in the village pancake race followed by a Lenten lunch. The netball team won two trophies.The Dartmoor netball league and the Teign Valley cup.
